about_the_game:
At the forefront of aerial combat and the heart of modern warfare, Drone Warfare: Global Ops places you in the cockpit of the unmanned aerial vehicle TB2. This game delivers a realistic and thrilling combat experience only a drone pilot could have.

Features:

Advanced Surveillance and Assault: Identify, track, and eliminate enemies with high-resolution cameras and precision weaponry.

Realistic Visuals: Explore the unique imagery of thermal and infrared cameras. Hunt down enemies in both day and night operations.

Strategic Gameplay: In a world where every shot counts, safeguard your allies and minimize civilian casualties.

Customizable Equipment: Modify your TB2 drone for various mission types and enhance your flying capabilities.

Unique Scenarios: Dive into a series of missions with immersive storytelling.

Game Story:

In a world where enemy forces threaten strategic points on Globe, take on the responsibility of ensuring the country's security using the capabilities of the TB2 drone. Each mission will come with a narrative that pulls you deeper, filled with challenges that test your skills.

With "Drone Warfare: Global Ops", blind the eyes of the enemy and become the protector of the skies!

short_description: Hava savaşlarının ön saflarında ve modern savaşın kalbinde yer alan Drone Warfare: Global Ops, sizi TB2 insansız hava aracının kokpitine yerleştiriyor. Bu oyun, yalnızca bir drone pilotunun yaşayabileceği gerçekçi ve heyecan verici bir savaş deneyimi sunuyor.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Bulgarian, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Hungarian, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish*, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Greek, Czech, Swedish, Indonesian, Azerbaijani, Hindi, Kazakh, Uzbek
*languages with full audio support
